About this site

Using Jekyll and Bootstrap, this site is maintained as my personal website and blog, based on the template developed by GAO Haoyang.

All of kinds of things may be put here.

Site update log

2015.07 Registration and launch of my personal domain fzheng.me, targeting to the server of MAE CUHK.
2015.07 Totally update the theme from dark style to simple light style, removing all the shadows.
2015.07 Foundation of the blog structure. Also use Github Pages. Thanks to Haoyang’s template.
2015.03 Foundation of my homepage maintained in Github Pages. Also kept as a mirror in server of my department.
